body.p: We held this meeting because it was necessary to discuss the current state of affairs at the nsr, as well as discuss the upcoming spring semester.

ul.li: Talk to Paul about becoming our Macintosh writer.
Talk to Brian about filling in for Jon, and then transitioning into the position.
Clean forums, if in 6 months no one uses forums, we dump.
Newsletter, use random image thing again between the two different snow images. //Definitely get that done tomorrow.
New stuff coming out very soon

body.p: Here are some photos from the meeting. Brad wanted to note that Jim is not wearing the same shirt as the last meetings...
